name: cannot
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 the negative form of the verb "can": I cannot predict what will happen next year. cannot but formal
used to say that something will certainly happen: If we persevere, we cannot but succeed.
See more
More examplesFewer examplesThe government cannot be seen to give in to terrorists' demands.It feels terrible when your child is ill and you cannot help them.Obviously the school cannot function without teachers.These plants cannot survive in very cold conditions.Some sounds cannot be detected by the human ear.

can not; to be unable or not allowed to: I cannot imagine what will happen next.
